title.rendered: MBA in Digital Business – Metaverse Specialty and NFTs online

content.rendered:
Structure of the MBA in Digital Business – Metaverse and NFTs Specialty:

Module 1. Lean Startup

  • Lean Start-up

  • Customer Development and Business Model

  • Minimum Viable Product

  • Draft

Module 2. Digital Strategy

  • Strategic Management, Competitive Analysis

  • Digital Operations Department

  • Innovation Department

  • Masterclass: Linkedin

  • Draft

Module 3. Agile Product Development

  • Agile development models

  • Discovery through Design Thinking

  • Delivery through Scrum

  • Draft

Module 4. HR

  • Leadership and Time Management

  • Team Management / Talent Search and Incorporation. People Selection

  • Remuneration and remuneration practices: Quotes

  • Draft

Module 5. Marketing: Business Engine

  • Marketing Guidelines. strategies and tactics

  • Marketing Organization. the CMO

  • Marketing Plan Design

  • Draft

Module 6. Product Market Fit

  • Market identification and adjustment

  • Product value identification and adjustment

  • Testing and metrics for the evaluation of iterations

  • Draft

Module 7. Clients and Marketing

  • Sales Principles

  • Sales techniques, negotiation, presentation and storytelling

  • Sales and Distribution Plan

  • Draft

Module 8. Exponential leadership

  • How to improve the ability to influence and persuasion

  • Speaking and Impact for Public Speaking

  • Management of emotions

  • Draft

Module 9. Marketing PULL

  • Concepts for the elaboration of a Pull Marketing plan

  • Design and development of a content strategy

  • Other tools and methodologies

  • Draft

Module 10. Economic and Financial Viability

  • Corporate finance and pension statements

  • Analysis of economic and financial statements

  • Investment projects analysis

  • Draft

Module 11. Marketing PUSH

  • Digital marketing

  • Ecommerce

  • Mobile Marketing

  • Draft

Module 12. Investment and Financing

  • Valuation of business projects and Presentation to investors, Pitch Deck, Executive Summary

  • Sources of financing for companies

  • Startups and cooperative financing

  • Draft

Module 13. UX & CX Customer Experience Design

  • The user’s journey and its study

  • Process and Techniques of Research and Design of the User Experience

  • Business Intelligence and Business Analytics

  • Draft

Module 14. Legal aspects of the Technological Company

  • The protection of intangible assets

  • Legal-business aspects

  • Compliance and data protection

  • Draft

Module 15. Exponential Growth & GotoMarket

  • Strategy for Growth

  • Growth Strategy I

  • Growth Strategy II

  • Draft

Module 16. Internationalization and Geostrategy

  • International Strategy

  • International marketing

  • International Operation

  • Draft

Module 17. Metaversic Ecosystem

  • Metaverse, current and future platforms

  • Technologies building the metaverse

  • Startups, profiles and management of metaversic projects

  • Draft

Module 18. Tokenomics: Token-Based Metaverse Economy

  • Blockchain technology and metaverse

  • Introduction to tokens

  • Smart Contracts and NFTs

  • Draft

Module 19. Web 3.0 and decentralized organizations DAOs

  • Web 3.0: disruption

  • DAOs: Decentralized Autonomous Organizations

  • The metaverse as a world order DAO

  • Draft

Module 20. Metaverse Use Cases

  • Business Models and Marketing in the Metaverse

  • Metaverse applied to gaming, esports, education and tourism

  • Metaverse applied to art, fashion and industry

  • Draft

Master’s Final Project | MBA in Digital Business – Metaverse and NFTs specialty

*The syllabus and the masterclass may undergo modifications due to their updating and improvement.
